Translations.Text: GOD bol MOJ IBA Lord ZVLADNUT; 1 KTO revealed this scripture! He chranit the righteous
Mat rad for idols ona set Him they nie pomoc ona nor mozem they pomoc
When ona invite them guidance they nie hear Ona see them looking ona they nie see
Ona vyletne miesto pardon zastanca znasanlivost disregard the ignorant
When devil whispers ona any whisper seek refuge GOD He bol Hearer Omniscient
Those bol righteous whenever devil zblizit sa them idea they zapamatat si whereupon they become seers
Ich brethren ceaselessly entice them ist astray
Ona nie produce zazrak they ziadat they say Why nie ziadat it Say ja len nasledovat co revealed mna moj Lord These je enlightenments z tvoj Lord guidance zlutovanie ludia verit
When Quran recited ona listen do it berie heed lenze ona attain zlutovanie
Ona zapamatat si tvoj Lord znutra publicly privately quietly dni i night; nie bol unaware
Those do tvoj Lord je never i proud kult Him; they glorify Him jesen prostrate before Him
